byline.original: By RAYMOND HERNANDEZ and DAVID W. CHEN
byline.contributor: Jeffrey E. Singer contributed reporting, and Toby Lyles contributed research.

snippet: The canvassing of nearly 100 homes and workplaces of donors that were listed on John C. Liu’s campaign finance reports has raised questions about the source and legitimacy of some donations.
lead_paragraph: The canvassing of nearly 100 homes and workplaces of donors that were listed on John C. Liu’s campaign finance reports has raised questions about the source and legitimacy of some donations.

headline.main: Doubts Raised on Donations to Comptroller
headline.print_headline: Doubts Raised On Donations To Comptroller
headline.seo: Irregularities Found in John Liu’s Campaign Finance Reports
